attributes.action: Adopt an Alien Residence/Work Policy on Immigration
attributes.additional_details:
This petition for the Home Office and HM Government to adopt an immigration policy (similar to that of the United States), to reduce legal and illegal immigrants creating legal, social and economic constraints within Great Britain and Northern Ireland.

The policy should ensure that legal immigrants remain as alien status (including EU residents outside the UK), and not have the ability to vote, not bring family members and not capable of becoming employed by HM Government.
